fixed_skill.desc:
Deal Physical damage to all foes equal to 95.0%/99.8%/104.5% of Attack.
If user has no Dragon's Blood, gain Dragon's Blood.
When gaining Dragon's Blood, reset duration, and enhance Dragon's Blood.
fixed_skill.name: Dragonslayer's Sword

innate_skill.desc: Increase party's ailment accuracy and ailment resistance by 6.5%/6.8%/7.2%, and Speed by 3 for 3 turns. For every 25% of the user's ailment accuracy, increase party's ailment accuracy by 1.1%/1.2%/1.2% more, up to 4.4%/4.6%/4.8%.
innate_skill.name: Masukukaja

innate_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 9.7% when ambushing.
innate_skill.name: Fortified Moxy IV

innate_skill.desc: Increase Physical and Gun damage (excluding 1 More) by 52.1%/54.7%/57.3% for 1 turn.
innate_skill.name: Charge

passive_skill.desc:
Increase Attack by 29.1%. At the beginning of battle, gain Dragon's Blood.
Dragon's Blood: When dealing Physical Damage, increase Attack by 7%. Lasts for 3 turns.
Also, after using a unique skill, enhance the effect of Dragon's Blood: When using a Physical skill, increase the damage 18% more, and critical damage by 18%.
passive_skill.name: Dragonblood Champion

passive_skill.desc:
Increase Attack by 29.1%. At the beginning of battle, gain Dragon's Blood.
Dragon's Blood: When dealing Physical Damage, increase Attack by 10%. Lasts for 3 turns.
Also, after using a unique skill, enhance the effect of Dragon's Blood: When using a Physical skill, increase the damage 18% more, and critical damage by 18%.
passive_skill.name: Dragonblood Champion I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
